reviews.review_text: As being an AMD CPU owner and an ATI HD6950 owner running the latest 14.11.2 Beta driver; this game runs great! Haven't had any issues that everyone else is talking about. Possibly lucky? I duuno. But I have been having a blast remembering how fun this game is. Good times.

Re-armed and Reloaded in HD; MDK2 is nothing much more than a satyrical throwback to 90's action/platform games where a fast trigger finger and fancy footwork around the alarming number of enemies will see you scraping through each relentless fight at the will of a pumping techno soundtrack that makes you feel like an unstoppable superhero, from start to finish.
such a entertaining game. I bought and played thru the original. And the hd is just stunning how great it is. Great job.. great game. Fun, hillarious, nice twists and engaging.
It does not work with AMD video cards. Unplayable as menus and HUD elements do not appear. DO NOT BUY IF YOU USE AN ATI/AMD CARD!
